title: mojo.core.Money
description:
The amount of money

Represents an amount of money with its currency type.

currencyCode.title: mojo.core.String
currencyCode.description: The 3-letter currency code defined in ISO 4217.

units.title: mojo.core.Int64
units.description:
The whole units of the amount.
For example if `currencyCode` is `"USD"`, then 1 unit is one US dollar.
